Ensure student journalism survives PERIOD Donate today PERIOD

By  Northern Star StaffOctober  

The following was taken directly from the University Police PERIOD Anyone mentioned is presumed innocent until proved guilty in a court of law PERIOD The University Police Department provides police reports on the Web at finfacil.niu.eduPublicSafety PERIOD

Saturday

At  a.m. an officer on patrol of the  block of North Annie Glidden Road conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle PERIOD The driver of the vehicle Danielle A PERIOD Jenca  of Lombard was arrested for a DUI PERIOD Jenca was processed at the NIU Police Department and released on an individual bond PERIOD

At  a.m. an officer on patrol of the New Residence Hall Complex West met with a person who was under  and intoxicated PERIOD The meeting resulted in the person being referred to the Office of Community Standards and Student Conduct for unlawful consumption of alcohol by a minor PERIOD

At  p.m. an officer was sent to Neptune Hall North in regard to a report of theft PERIOD The officer met with the complainant and took a report PERIOD The case is administratively closed due to a lack of leads PERIOD

At  p.m. officers were sent to Stevenson Towers North in regard to a report of cannabis PERIOD Officers met with a person in the room in question PERIOD The meeting resulted in the person being referred to the Office of Community Standards and Student Conduct for possession of cannabis PERIOD

Sunday

At  p.m PERIOD on Oct PERIOD  an officer was sent to Lincoln Hall in regard to a report of theft PERIOD The officer met with the complainant and took a report PERIOD On Sunday this case was administratively closed due to a lack of leads PERIOD

At  p.m. an officer was sent to the New Residence Hall Complex East in regard to a report of disorderly conduct PERIOD The officer met with the complainant and took a report PERIOD On Sunday officers identified an offender who was referred to the Office of Community Standards and Student Conduct for disorderly conduct PERIOD

At  a.m. an officer on patrol at Neptune Hall East met with people who were under  and intoxicated PERIOD The meeting resulted in the people being referred to the Office of Community Standards and Student Conduct for unlawful consumption of alcohol by a minor PERIOD

At  a.m. an officer at the  block of North Annie Glidden Road conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle PERIOD The driver of the vehicle Najh L PERIOD Lewis  of Chicago had an active arrest warrant for failure to appear in court on a charge of shoplifting PERIOD Lewis was transported to the DeKalb County jail PERIOD

At  a.m. officers were sent to Stevenson Towers North in regard to a report of cannabis PERIOD The officers met with a person in the room in question PERIOD The meeting resulted in Nicholas A PERIOD Smith  of Palatine being arrested for possession of cannabis PERIOD Smith was processed at the NIU Police Department and released on  bond PERIOD

At  a.m. an officer was on patrol of Stevenson Towers North met with a person in regard to a report of criminal damage PERIOD The meeting resulted in the person being referred to the Office of Community Standards and Student Conduct for criminal damage to property PERIOD

At  a.m. an officer was sent to Douglas Hall in regard to a report of domestic battery PERIOD The officer arrived on the scene and investigated PERIOD Devon J PERIOD Etheridge  of Chicago was arrested for domestic battery PERIOD Etheridge was processed at the NIU Police Department and transported to the DeKalb County jail PERIOD
